content:
Apple has two new openings for their FHIR team, one iOS developer and one general senior dev.

https://jobs.apple.com/en-us/details/200081719/ios-software-engineer?team=SFTWR
https://jobs.apple.com/en-us/details/200081717/sr-software-engineer-health-data-standards?team=SFTWR

At Apple we want to make great products that empower people to improve their health. We are seeking a senior level, energetic and self-driven iOS software engineer to join Appleâ€™s Health team to focus on upcoming features that rely on health data standards. As a member of our fast-paced group, you will have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming features that will delight and inspire millions of Apple's customers every day. (Santa Clara Valley)

https://jobs.apple.com/en-us/details/200290885/software-engineer-health-data-standards
